TopicTitle: anyone able to use UnityAssetsExplorer on Win10 x64?

Articles.Content: Anyone else able to use the UnityAssetsExplorer under Windows 10 64-bit? I've tried opening an asset file from both KSP_Data and KSP_x64_Data with no success, just a bunch of ERROR msgs scrolling up the log window until the program becomes non-responsive. Or it comes up with a negative number of assets in the file. I've used UAE successfully before for pre-v1 asset tweaking on W7 x64.
